name: Brushed Off
description:
Arrow Keys = Move

Z = Shoot Bullets

X = Shoot Goo and stick on second press

C = Jetpack

Aim of the game, using your tools fill in the outline with paint, the paint will fly in from both sides randomly. Bullets will splat the paint on impact. Goo: you shoot goo and it will act like a bullet if you press shoot goo again it will stick in that place, if a paint blob hits it the paint will splat, if you shoot a paint blob with another goo it will go towards the first. Jet-pack allows you to fly.

This is the third game I have made and the second that was supervised by Najam Haq. In this game you play as a painter trapped in a painting trying to get out.

Note I made this a while ago.
